Discussion and support
----------------------
Report bugs on the
`GitHub issue tracker <https://github.com/jmuelbert/jmopenorders/issues>`_.
Links to additional resources can be found on the
`jmopenorders wiki <https://github.com/jmuelbert/jmopenorders/wiki/Links>`_.
